pli-tv-pvr8:0.2: Questions and replies regarding the observance day, etc.
pli-tv-pvr8:0.3: 1. Questioning in the beginning, the middle, and the end
pli-tv-pvr8:1.1: What is the beginning, the middle, and the end of an observance-day procedure?
pli-tv-pvr8:1.2: What is the beginning, the middle, and the end of an invitation procedure?
pli-tv-pvr8:1.3: What is the beginning, the middle, and the end of a legal procedure of condemnation?
pli-tv-pvr8:1.4: What is the beginning, the middle, and the end of a legal procedure of demotion?
pli-tv-pvr8:1.5: What is the beginning, the middle, and the end of a legal procedure of banishment?
pli-tv-pvr8:1.6: What is the beginning, the middle, and the end of a legal procedure of reconciliation?
pli-tv-pvr8:1.7: What is the beginning, the middle, and the end of a legal procedure of suspension?
pli-tv-pvr8:1.8: What is the beginning, the middle, and the end of a legal procedure of giving probation?
pli-tv-pvr8:1.9: What is the beginning, the middle, and the end of a legal procedure of sending back to the beginning?
pli-tv-pvr8:1.10: What is the beginning, the middle, and the end of a legal procedure of giving the trial period?
pli-tv-pvr8:1.11: What is the beginning, the middle, and the end of a legal procedure of rehabilitation?
pli-tv-pvr8:1.12: What is the beginning, the middle, and the end of an ordination procedure?
pli-tv-pvr8:1.13: What is the beginning, the middle, and the end of the lifting of a legal procedure of condemnation?
pli-tv-pvr8:1.18: What is the beginning of a verdict of innocence …
pli-tv-pvr8:1.19: of a verdict of past insanity …
pli-tv-pvr8:1.20: of a decision for specific depravity …
pli-tv-pvr8:1.21: of a covering over (as) with grass …
pli-tv-pvr8:1.22: What is the beginning of an agreement as to an exhorter of nuns …
pli-tv-pvr8:1.23: of an agreement to be away, separated from the three robes …
pli-tv-pvr8:1.24: of an agreement as to a rug …
pli-tv-pvr8:1.25: of an agreement as to a silver-remover …
pli-tv-pvr8:1.26: as to an assigner of outer cloaks …
pli-tv-pvr8:1.27: as to an assigner of bowls …
pli-tv-pvr8:1.30: as to a walking-staff and string, what is in the middle, what is the ending?
pli-tv-pvr8:2.1: What is the beginning of a (formal) act for Observance, what is in the middle, what is the ending?
pli-tv-pvr8:2.2: The “being all together” is the beginning of a (formal) act for Observance, carrying out is in the middle, the conclusion is the ending.
pli-tv-pvr8:3.1: What is the beginning of a (formal) act for Invitation … ?
pli-tv-pvr8:3.2: The “being all together” is the beginning … the conclusion is the ending.
pli-tv-pvr8:4.1: What is the beginning of a (formal) act of censure …
pli-tv-pvr8:5.6: of sending back to the beginning …
pli-tv-pvr8:5.9: The matter and the individual are the beginning, a motion is in the middle, a resolution is the ending.
pli-tv-pvr8:6.1: What is the beginning for a (formal) act of ordination … ?
pli-tv-pvr8:6.2: The individual is the beginning of a (formal) act for ordination, a motion is in the middle, a resolution is the ending.
pli-tv-pvr8:7.1: What is the beginning of a nullification of a (formal) act of censure …
pli-tv-pvr8:8.4: of suspension, what is in the middle, what is the ending?
pli-tv-pvr8:8.5: Proper conduct is the beginning, a motion is in the middle, a resolution is the ending.
pli-tv-pvr8:9.1: What is the beginning of a verdict of innocence …
pli-tv-pvr8:10.1: of a verdict of past insanity …
pli-tv-pvr8:10.2: of a decision for specific depravity …
pli-tv-pvr8:10.3: of a covering over (as) with grass …
pli-tv-pvr8:10.4: of an agreement as to an exhorter of nuns …
pli-tv-pvr8:10.12: of an agreement as to a walking-staff and string, what is in the middle, what is the ending?
pli-tv-pvr8:10.13: The matter and the individual are the beginning, a motion is in the middle, a resolution is the ending.
